name: TinyCanvas
description:
Exports compressed images in a click!


FEATURES:


- Optimized Load Time:

Compressed image size helps in quick loading of websites and apps


- Supports Most widely used formats:

Download images in PNG and JPEG formats


- High resolution:

Up to 4X resolution, users can download compressed images


- Downloads .Zip file:

Multiple images will get compressed and downloaded in zip folder in one go


HOW TO USE:


1. Post installing, go to Plugins > TinyCanvas > Set up TinyPNG API Key and follow below steps


â€¢ Go to TinyPNG website and click on 'Developer API'.click on the 'Get your API key' button by providing your name and valid email address.

â€¢ A verification mail sent to the provided email address. Now click on â€˜Visit your dashboardâ€™ button from email and copy the API Key

â€¢ Paste the API key and start compressing images


2. Once API Key set up is done


â€¢ Select at least one layer and click on Plugins > TinyCanvas > PNG/JPG Export

â€¢ Choose any resolution from 0.5x to 4x

â€¢ Then download
